statements: UPDATE performance_reviews SET is_completed = true WHERE review_id = 12345;
UPDATE performance_reviews SET review_notes = 'Well done!' WHERE employee_id = 98765;
UPDATE performance_reviews SET review_notes = 'Great performance, keep it up!', is_completed = TRUE WHERE review_id = 1001
UPDATE performance_reviews SET review_date = '2022-11-30', is_completed = FALSE, review_notes = 'Needs improvement in communication skills' WHERE employee_id = 101
UPDATE employees SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE employee_id=1;
UPDATE performance_reviews SET review_date='2022-10-15', review_notes='Great performance' WHERE review_id=3;

UPDATE PerformanceReviews SET performance_rating = 5 WHERE review_id = 1;

UPDATE Employees SET position = 'Senior Developer', department = 'Engineering' WHERE employee_id = 2002;

UPDATE PerformanceReviewReminders SET reminder_message = 'Don't forget to complete your performance review!' WHERE employee_id = 101 AND reminder_date = '2022-11-30';
